SA14bsa031_u:133_0: nirvide virāgāya nirodhāya ca pratipanno bhavatītyatastayoḥ duḥkhasamudayayoḥ pratyekaḥ para-pralopadharmasvarūpau nirvidākārau,
SA14bsa031_u:134_1: tataścaiṣāṃ svabhāvānupalambhabhāvanayā mārgajñatādhikāre śrāvakāṇāṃ mārgo bodhisatvenaivaṃ parijñeyaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:136_2: evaṃ rūpādīnāṃ 'na nityaṃ nānityam' ityupalambhayogataḥ sthānaniṣedhena,
SA14bsa031_u:136_3_0: yasmāt tathāgatena bodhimabhisambudhya dharmā na samīkṣitā iti pramāṇapuruṣādarśanakāraṇopapattyā
SA14bsa031_u:138_0: śrāvakamārgānantaraṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ mārgābhidhāne nyāyaprāpte 'pi śrāvakebhyaḥ kathaṃ prativiśiṣṭāste yena teṣāṃ mārgabheda ityāśaṅkya vaiśiṣṭyapratipādanārthaṃ tāvadāha -
SA14bsa031_u:139_2: pratyekabuddhāḥ punaḥ svayaṃ pūrvaśrutādyabhisaṃskāreṇa paropadeśaṃ pratyanapekṣāḥ svabodhisamadhigacchantyatasteṣāṃ buddhādyupadeśanairarthakyamityekaṃ vaiśiṣṭyam /
SA14bsa031_u:139_4: te (pratyekabuddhāḥ) punaḥ aśabdoccāraṇadharmadeśanayā svādhigatajñānādisāmarthyena parān daśakuśalādau pravartayantyatasteṣāṃ jñānasyānavabodhatayā dvitīyaṃ vaiśiṣṭyamiti /
SA14bsa031_u:abhis_2.7_0: śuśrūṣā yasya yasyārthe yatra yatra yathā yathā /
SA14bsa031_u:abhis_2.7_1: sa so 'rthaḥ khyātyaśabdo 'pi tasya tasya tathā tathā //
SA14bsa031_u:141_0: iti / nāvitarkya nāvicārya vācaṃ bhāṣata ityālāpo vikṣepaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:141_1: sa ca santānakṣobhamādadhātīti yathā yathā bodhisattvena 'buddho bhūtvā ālāpamantareṇa dharmadeśanāṃ kuryām' iti praṇidhānaṃ pravartitam,
SA14bsa031_u:141_2: tathā buddhatvasāmyāt pratyekabuddhāvasthāyāñca praṇidhānādisāmarthyena yasminnarthe yena prakāreṇa yasya śravaṇecchā,
SA14bsa031_u:141_3: tasya vijñāne tenaiva prakāreṇa aśabdo 'pi so 'rthaḥ pratibhātītyaśabdadharmadeśanocyate /
SA14bsa031_u:141_4: ityevaṃ vakṣyamāṇadharmasya śrotṛvijñāne sunirmāṇamutpādaścetyayaṃ bhavati dharmadeśanā śabdārthaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:142_0: vaiśiṣṭyamevamabhidhāya viśiṣṭānāṃ viśiṣṭa eva mārga iti prakṛtapratyekabuddhamārgamāha -
SA14bsa031_u:143_2_1: viśeṣaviśiṣṭadharmādhigamaśca bodhisattvena parijñeyo na sarvākārajñāneneti pratyekabuddhamārgaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:144_0: nirvedhabhāgīyādhigame sati yathoktamārga utpadyata iti nirvedhabhāgīyamāha -
SA14bsa031_u:148_0_1: ceti catvāraḥ kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāḥ pratyekaṃ duḥkhādisatyasambandhayuktā aihikāmutrikairguṇairyuktā
SA14bsa031_u:150_0: paramārthataḥ tathatābuddhayorādhārādheyabhāvo na vidyata ityatastayoḥ paryāyeṇāvasthiterananujñānam /
SA14bsa031_u:153_2: buddhatvābhilāṣiṇā svayaṃ prāṇātipātaviratyādipūrvakaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthitvā tatraiva pareṣāṃ sthāpanam /
SA14bsa031_u:153_3: dānādīnāmakṣayaṃ kartumicchatā samyaksambodhau pariṇāmanamityevaṃ mārgasatyasyākārā bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:154_0: kecidiha kārikārthopalakṣaṇapareṇa granthena ākārārthamanuktvā darśanamārgaṣoḍaśakṣaṇopalakṣaṇameva kevalamanukṛtamiti varṇayanti,
SA14bsa031_u:154_3: 'ālambanamanityādi satyādhāraṃ tadākṛtiḥ' ityādikārikārthaśca kathaṃ vyākhyeya ityapare /
SA14bsa031_u:156_0: darśanamārgānantaraṃ bhāvanāmārgābhidhāne sati svalpavaktatvena phalanimnatvena ca vineyapravṛtteḥ tatkāritraṃ tāvat -
SA14bsa031_u:161_0: iti / svobhayaparārthopalambhatayā yathādhimokṣaṃ dṛṣṭakuśaladharmadhiṣṭhānā bhāvanāmārgādhikārādādau asākṣātkriyārūpādhimuktiḥ trividhā satī pratyekaṃ mṛdvādibhedena trividhā /
SA14bsa031_u:163_0: tadbhāvakabodhisattvasyotsāhavardhanāya tadadhimokṣasya styutyādayo buddhādibhiḥ kriyanta iti stutiṃ,
SA14bsa031_u:abhis_2.20_0: stutiḥ stobhaḥ praśaṃsā ca prajñāpāramitāṃ prati /
SA14bsa031_u:167_0: iti / yathokto viśeṣādhimokṣaḥ, anupalambhaḥ, aviparyāsaḥ, viviktaḥ, tathāgatakuśalamūlaudhasvabhāvasmṛtiḥ,
SA14bsa031_u:174_1: sa ca dvividha iti prathamamabhinirhāralakṣaṇaṃ bhāvanāmārgamāha -
SA14bsa031_u:176_0: 11 - atyantaviśuddhiḥ tadanantaraṃ yaḥ parigrahatyāgena prāpsyamānaḥ kastasyotpādānutpādaheturiti ākāṃkṣānirāsadvāreṇa dvitīyamatyantaviśuddhilakṣaṇamāha -
SA14bsa031_u:180_0: iti / āryapudgalasya yat śrāmaṇyatāphalaṃ tasya sarvavipakṣarahitatvena yā viśuddhiḥ saiva rūpādiviśuddhiḥ,
SA14bsa031_u:180_2: prabhedatvena yasmāt tadviśuddhiḥ abhinnā acchinnā tasmāt svasāmānyalakṣaṇanānātvavirahād evaṃ viśuddhirabhidhīyate /
SA14bsa031_u:182_0: iti / rāgādikleśaprahāṇāt, etasya jñeyāvaraṇaikadeśagrāhyavikalpasya ca prahāṇāt,
SA14bsa031_u:183_0: mārgajñatādhikāre viśuddikathanaprasaṅgādātyantikī cetarā ca buddhānāṃ śrāvakādīnāṃ ca yathākramaṃ viśuddhiḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:184_0: iti / kāradhātudhyānārūpyasamāpattaya iti navabhūmiṣvadhimātrādinavaprakāravipakṣasya pratipakṣabhāvena mṛdumṛdvādimārgo yathākramaṃ navaprakāraḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:184_1: sarvathānyathā ca viśuddhihetutvādātyantikī cetarā ca viśuddhiriti /
SA14bsa031_u:186_0_0: iti / tatrādhimātrādhimātrādiḥ pratipakṣo mṛdumṛdvādirvipakṣa iti bhavitavyamiticodyasya
SA14bsa031_u:186_1: traidhātukākārajñānajñeyānupalambhād yā samatā saiva samastapratipakṣatvādātyantikī viśuddhirbuddhasya vyavasthāpyata iti /
SA14bsa031_u:190_0: sarvavastuparijñānaṃ vinā na mārgajñatāparijñānaṃ samyag iti sarvajñatāmāha -
SA14bsa031_u:abhis_3.1_0: nāpare na pare tīre nāntarāle tayoḥ sthitā /
SA14bsa031_u:191_0: iti / traiyadhvikadharmāṇāmanutpādākāreṇa tulyatāvabodhāt buddhabodhisattvānāṃ yā āsannībhūtā matā prajñāpāramitā,
SA14bsa031_u:191_1: sā khalu prajñayā punarnāpare tīre saṃsāre,
SA14bsa031_u:191_2: na pare tīre nirvāṇe ca yathākramaṃ śāśvatocchedalakṣaṇe,
SA14bsa031_u:191_3: na tayormadhye 'pi vyavasthiteti na saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ vyavasthitā /
SA14bsa031_u:193_0: sarvajñatādhikārād vyatirekanirdeśena śrāvakādīnāṃ tryadhvasamatājñānābhāvāt samyak prajñāpāramitā dūrībhūteti /
SA14bsa031_u:193_1: svādhigamamātrātmikā tu prajñāpāramitā kṛpāprajñāvaikalyānnirvāṇe saṃsāre cāvasthitā vastvastūpalambhatayeti jñeyā /
SA14bsa031_u:193_2: 'yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā' iti nyāyādadhvatrayasamatājñānaṃ padārthāvabodha eva,
SA14bsa031_u:193_3: nanu sa ca sarveṣāmeva samastīti kathaṃ śrāvakabodhisattvādīnāṃ samyak prajñāpāramitādūrībhāvaḥ,
SA14bsa031_u:194_0_0: iti / māyākāranirmitavastunaḥ pratibhāse aviditatatsvarūpasya bhāvābhiniveśitā naiḥsvābhāvyāpratibhāsa
SA14bsa031_u:194_0_1: iva kalyāṇamitrādyupāyakauśalavaikalyād vastu nimittayogena pratipattau tatsamatāparijñānamavijñātabhāvarūpāṇāṃ
SA14bsa031_u:197_0: iti / sarveṣāṃ rūpādīnāṃ traiyadhvikānāñca dharmāṇāṃ sāsravānāsravobhayasthānīyānāmanupalambhasvarūpāṇāṃ sarvatra bhāvopalambhatayā te paraparikalpitātmādiśūnyatvena dṛṣṭāḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:197_1: anuṣṭhānasaṃjñā tu eteṣāṃ pratipakṣabhūtāni viparyāsapravṛttatvena heyatvāt vipakṣo bhavati /
SA14bsa031_u:200_0: iti / trimaṇḍalaviśuddhyā dānādāvanātmāvabodhena svaparayorniyojanaṃ samyak pravṛttatvāt sarvasaktinicayasthānapratiṣedhena copādeyatvāt sarvathā pratipakṣaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:200_1: tathāgatādiṣu namaskārādiḥ puṇyasambhārahetutvena pratipakṣo 'pi san sūkṣmasaktirūpatayā na sarvathā pratipakṣa iti vipakṣo bhavati /
SA14bsa031_u:203_0: iti / yasmāt svabhāvenaiva dharmagotrāṇāṃ śūnyatvāt teṣāṃ gāmbhīryam,
SA14bsa031_u:205_0: iti / rūpādisarvadharmāṇāmekaiva prakṛtiḥ yaduta niḥsvabhāva iti jñānajñeyasamataikaparijñāne saktirvarjitā bhavati /
SA14bsa031_u:208_0: iti / yasmāt sarvavijñānopalavdhārthanirākaraṇena tasyāḥ prakṛterdurbodhatā kathitā,
SA14bsa031_u:abhis_3.7_0: evaṃ kṛtvā yathokto vai jñeyaḥ sarvajñatānate /
SA14bsa031_u:211_0: iti / sarvajñatādhikāre yathoktanayena yathākramaṃ śrāvakabodhisattvādīnāṃ vipakṣapratipakṣayorayaṃ prabhedo 'vasātavyaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:213_0: vipakṣādi evamabhidhāya tayorvibhāvanāyāṃ kaḥ prayoga iti cet prayogamāha -
SA14bsa031_u:abhis_3.9_0: avikāro na karttā ca prayogo duṣkarastridhā /
SA14bsa031_u:215_0: rūpādisarvadharmāḥ, teṣāmevānityatāśūnyatādayaḥ, pratipūrṇāpūrṇatā, asaṅgaḥ, anyathā 'vikāraḥ, akartṛtvam, trisarvajñatātmakānāṃ yathākramaṃ uddeśaprayogakāritrāṇāṃ duṣkaratā,
SA14bsa031_u:217_0: samatādvāreṇa prayogo bhāvanīya iti prayogānantaraṃ samatāmāha -
SA14bsa031_u:220_0: prayogasamatāṃ pratividhya darśanamārgo bhāvanīya iti darśanamārgamāha -
SA14bsa031_u:221_0: iti / pratisatyaṃ dharmajñānakṣāntirdharmajñānamanvayajñānakṣāntiranvayajñānamityevaṃ ṣoḍaśakṣaṇātmakaḥ sarvajñatādhikāre darśanamārgo bhavati /
SA14bsa031_u:223_3: ātmānātmasvabhāvābhāvānnotpannaṃ na niruddhaṃ na saṃkliṣṭaṃ na vyavadātamityādayo duḥkhasatyākārā bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:226_3: nairyāṇikānairyāṇikavikalpatvenobhaye vācyavācakabhāvalakṣaṇe jñeye śabde jñānasyānutpattiriti mārgasatyākārā bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:227_0: evamete ākārāḥ sarvajñatākṣaṇā iti bodhisattvānāṃ darśamārgaḥ,
SA14bsa031_u:227_2: śrāvakamārgo bodhisattvena parijñātavyo na sākṣātkaraṇīya iti bhāvanāmārgo na nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:abhis_3.16_0: iti seyaṃ punaḥ seyaṃ khalu punastridhā /
SA14bsa031_u:229_1: iyaṃ mārgajñatā, iyaṃ sarvajñatā cetyevaṃ parivartatrayeṇa prakāratrayaṃ parisamāptam /
SA14bsa031_u:234_0: parijñātatrisarvajñatāvaśitvārthaṃ punaḥ sarvākāramārgavastujñānasaṅgraheṇa trisarvajñatāṃ bhāvayatīti sarvākārābhisambodha ityāha -
SA14bsa031_u:abhis_4.1_1: sarvajñatānāṃ traividhyāt trividhā eva te matāḥ //
SA14bsa031_u:abhis_4.2_1: catvāraḥ pratisatyaṃ te mārge pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ //
SA14bsa031_u:237_0_1: iti dvādaśa ākārā hi yathākramaṃ duḥkhādisatyatrayasya anityādilakṣaṇā bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:237_2: sarvajñatayā pratyekabuddhāḥ saṅgṛhītā iti teṣāṃ jñeyāvaraṇapratipakṣatvena dvau sāsravānāsravabhāvanāmārgau ceti mārgāḥ triprakārāḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:238_0: tatra prathame akārakājānakāsaṃkrāntyavinayākārā iti catvāro yathākramaṃ mārgādilakṣaṇāḥ (kleśāvaraṇapratipakṣe) bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:241_0: ityevaṃ mārgasatyasya pañcadaśa ākārāḥ / samudāyena saptaviṃśatiriti sarvajñatākārā bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:abhis_4.3_0: hetau mārge ca duḥkhe ca nirodho ca yathākramam /
SA14bsa031_u:abhis_4.3_1: aṣṭau te sapta pañceti ṣoḍaśeti ca kīrtitāḥ //
SA14bsa031_u:243_1: duḥkhanirodhasatye ca phalamityarthadvāreṇa nirdiṣṭe samudayamārgaduḥkhanirodhasatyeṣu yathāsaṃkhyamaṣṭādyākārā boddhavyāḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:244_0: tatra virāga-asamutthāna-śānta-arāga-adveṣa-amoha-niḥkleśa-niḥsattvākārā eva yathākramaṃ yo hetuḥ chando rāgo nandī ca,
SA14bsa031_u:244_2: yaḥ prabhavaḥ parikalpaḥ, yaśca pratyayaḥ sattvābhiniveśa iti eteṣāṃ pratipakṣabhūtatvena trayastraya eka eka ityaṣṭāvākārāḥ samudayasatye bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:245_0: apramāṇa-antadvayānanugama-asambhinna-aparāmṛṣṭa-avikalpa-aprameya-asaṅgākārā-yathākramaṃ yaḥ sarvasattvāvakāśado mārgaḥ yathā va sarvasattvāvakāśadaḥ,
SA14bsa031_u:245_1: yo nyāyo yathā ca nyāyaḥ, yā pratipattiryathā ca pratipattiḥ,
SA14bsa031_u:245_2: yacca niryāṇamiti tatsvabhāvā dvau dvau dvāveka iti saptākārā mārgasatye bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:246_0: anitya-duḥkha-śūnya-anātmākārāḥ pañcamālakṣaṇākārasvabhāvā ityevaṃ pañcākārā duḥkhasatye bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:247_4: svabhāvanirodhena abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatākāra ekaḥ niḥsaraṇākārātmaka ityevaṃ ṣoḍaśākārā nirodhasatye bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:249_0: smṛtyupasthānamārabhya buddhākāraparyantānāṃ hi trisarvajñatāsaṅgṛhītamārgadvāreṇa sarvākārajñatayā sarveṣāmāryapudgalānāṃ saṅgrahaṇena ca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ saptatriṃśat,
SA14bsa031_u:249_1: bodhisattvānāṃ catustriṃśat, buddhānāṃ triṃśannava ceti matāḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:249_3_0: tato 'vatīrṇasya vīryamiti utpannānutpannasya akuśalasya kuśalasya ca yathākramaṃ
SA14bsa031_u:249_5: kṛtacittaparikarmaṇo 'nantaramūṣmamūrdhaprayogaḥ iti ūṣmamūrdhasvabhāvāḥ śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñendriyākārāḥ pañca samyagabhisamayaprāyogikamārgaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:249_6: adhigatoṣmādeḥ kṣāntyagradharmaprayoga iti kṣāntyagradharmasvabhāvāḥ śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñābalākārāḥ pañca abhisamayasaṃśleṣamārgaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:250_2: traidhātukapraṇidhānapratipakṣaḥ iti tatsvabhāvā yathākramaṃ śūnyānātmākārasvabhāvaṃ prathamaṃ vimokṣamukham,
SA14bsa031_u:251_0: avibhāvitavibhāvitarūpasaṃjñatvād yathākramamadhyātmaṃ rūpyarūpīti bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatītyetau nirmāṇāvaraṇapratipakṣeṇa dvau vimokṣau /
SA14bsa031_u:251_1_0: śubhāśubharūpanirmāṇe ca yathākramamābhogaḥ prātikūlyañca saṃkleśaḥ tatpratipakṣeṇa
SA14bsa031_u:251_1_1: śubhaṃ vimokṣamukhaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya viharatītyeko vimokṣa iti vimokṣākārāḥ
SA14bsa031_u:252_0: mokṣānukūlavihāramārgasvabhāvāścaturārūpyasamāpattyākārāḥ śāntavihārasvabhāvaḥ saṃjñāveditanirodhākāra eka iti pañcākārā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāramārgaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:254_2: buddho 'hamityātmapratijñāne rāgādīnāmantarāyatvākhyāne sarvajñatādimārgasya niryāṇatvaprakāśane kṣīṇāsravatvenātmano 'bhyupagame ca paryanuyokturabhāvena vaiśāradyākārāścatvāraḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:254_3: paryāye dharmalakṣaṇe janapadabhāṣāyāṃ dharmaprabhede ca yathākramaṃ dharmārthaniruktipratibhānapratisaṃvidākārāścatvāraḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:254_4: nāsti skhalitaḥ ravitaṃ muṣitasmṛtirasamāhitaṃ cittaṃ nānātvasaṃjñā apratisaṃkhyāyopekṣā cetyevamākārāḥ ṣaṭ /
SA14bsa031_u:254_5: nāstichandato vīryataḥ smṛtitaḥ samādheḥ prajñāyāḥ vimukteśca parihāṇirityevamākārāḥ ṣaṭ /
SA14bsa031_u:255_2: anāsravā eva sarvākārajñatākārāḥ sarvathā savāsanasarvakleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇena samyaksambuddhasya sarvadharmavaśavartitvād,
SA14bsa031_u:256_1: te ca prayoktāraṃ vinā kathayitumaśakyā iti śravaṇādibhājanaṃ prayoktāramāha -
SA14bsa031_u:257_3: kalyāṇamitrairadhiṣṭhitāśca yathākramamākāralakṣaṇāyā māturasyā granthaśravaṇadhāraṇāmuṣitārthayathānayamanaskārāṇāṃ bhājanaṃ buddhādibhiḥ matamiti /
